subject: Olympic Games (2008)
Horsemanship and Equestrian Events
Steroids
lead_paragraph: The Brazilian equestrian rider Bernardo Alves was officially disqualified from the Beijing Olympics for a positive drug test on his horse. He was the second member of the Brazilian team to be disqualified. The International Equestrian Federation also suspended Alves from competing for three and a half months.
